name: Edge Runner 2.0
description:
This is a prototype game made by me and dinesh in order to understand level designing and difficulty curve. We bring back the isometric view along with the simple three button control.

Use A and D to turn left or right, and space to jump, or,

Left arrow key and Right arrow key to turn left or right, and Up arrow key to jump.

Dinesh itch page: https://deendinesh.itch.io/
